mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND ACCEPT='Y' AND USER_DELETE = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL='2' AND ACCEPT='N' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APART WHERE APT_ACCEPT='N'

SELECT COUNT(*) ALLP, NVL(COUNT(DECODE(ACCEPT,'Y',1,NULL)),0) ACCP, NVL(COUNT(DECODE(ACCEPT,'N',1,NULL)),0) DISACC, NVL(COUNT(DECODE(USER_DELETE,'Y',1,NULL)),0) DELP FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN ('1','2')
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN (1,2) AND ACCEPT = 'N' ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE NICKNAME=#{nick}
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN (1,2) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_DELETE='N' AND USER_LEVEL IN (1,2)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN (1,2) AND ACCEPT='Y' AND USER_DELETE='N' AND ACCEPT='N' AND USER_DELETE='Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN (1,2) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC )
AND ACCEPT='Y' AND USER_DELETE='N' AND ACCEPT='N' AND USER_DELETE='Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN (1,2) AND (ACCEPT='Y' OR ACCEPT='N') AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND ACCEPT='Y' AND USER_DELETE='N' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND ACCEPT='N' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND USER_DELETE='Y' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN (1,2) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC )
AND (ACCEPT='Y' OR ACCEPT='N') AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND ACCEPT='Y' AND USER_DELETE='N' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND ACCEPT='N' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND USER_DELETE='Y' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
SELECT NVL(COUNT(DECODE(USER_LEVEL,'1',1,NULL)),0) LV1, NVL(COUNT(DECODE(USER_LEVEL,'2',1,NULL)),0) LV2 FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT='N'
SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT='N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT='N'
AND USER_LEVEL = 2
AND USER_LEVEL = 1

SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT='N'
AND USER_LEVEL = 2
AND USER_LEVEL = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT='N'
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND USER_LEVEL=2 AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND USER_LEVEL=1 AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'

SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT='N'
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND USER_LEVEL=2 AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
AND USER_LEVEL=1 AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%' AND APT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.aptName} || '%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID IN
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT = 'N' AND APT_NAME = #{aptName}

SELECT COUNT(*) ALLP, NVL(COUNT(DECODE(ACCEPT,'Y',1,NULL)),0) ACCP, NVL(COUNT(DECODE(ACCEPT,'N',1,NULL)),0) DISACC, NVL(COUNT(DECODE(USER_DELETE,'Y',1,NULL)),0) DELP FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL = 1 AND APT_NAME = #{aptName}
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_LEVEL IN 1 AND ACCEPT = 'N' AND APT_NAME = #{aptName} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} AND USER_LEVEL = 1
AND ACCEPT = 'Y' AND USER_DELETE = 'N' AND ACCEPT = 'N' AND USER_DELETE = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} AND USER_LEVEL = 1
AND ACCEPT = 'Y' AND USER_DELETE = 'N' AND ACCEPT = 'N' AND USER_DELETE = 'Y'

AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%'

AND USER_DELETE = 'Y' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%'

SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} AND USER_LEVEL = 1
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%'

AND USER_DELETE = 'Y' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT = 'N' AND USER_LEVEL = 1 AND APT_NAME = #{aptName}
SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE ACCEPT = 'N' AND USER_LEVEL = 1 AND APT_NAME = #{aptName}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{so.nickName} || '%' AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{so.userName} || '%' AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{so.phone} || '%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{so.email} || '%'

mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_DELETE='Y' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND USER_NAME = #{name}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_PWD = #{uuid} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT bNo, title, createDate, userId, bcount, bdelete, free, market, club, club_notice FROM(SELECT b.BOARD_NO bNo, b.BOARD_TITLE title, b.CREATE_DATE createDate, m.USER_ID userId, b.BOARD_COUNT bcount, b.BOARD_DELETE bdelete, f.board_no free, m.board_no market, c.board_no club, n.board_no club_notice FROM TB_BOARD b JOIN TB_USER m ON(b.USER_ID = m.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN tb_free f ON(b.board_no = f.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_market m ON(b.board_no = m.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club c ON(b.board_no = c.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club_notice n ON(b.board_no = n.board_no) WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT bNo, title, createDate, userId, bcount, bdelete, free, market, club, club_notice FROM(SELECT b.BOARD_NO bNo, b.BOARD_TITLE title, b.CREATE_DATE createDate, m.USER_ID userId, b.BOARD_COUNT bcount, b.BOARD_DELETE bdelete, f.board_no free, m.board_no market, c.board_no club, n.board_no club_notice FROM TB_BOARD b JOIN TB_USER m ON(b.USER_ID = m.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN tb_free f ON(b.board_no = f.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_market m ON(b.board_no = m.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club c ON(b.board_no = c.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club_notice n ON(b.board_no = n.board_no) WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_ID) WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{so.title} || '%' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%'

SELECT bNo, title, createDate, userId, bcount, bdelete, free, market, club, club_notice FROM(SELECT b.BOARD_NO bNo, b.BOARD_TITLE title, b.CREATE_DATE createDate, m.USER_ID userId, b.BOARD_COUNT bcount, b.BOARD_DELETE bdelete, f.board_no free, m.board_no market, c.board_no club, n.board_no club_notice FROM TB_BOARD b JOIN TB_USER m ON(b.USER_ID = m.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN tb_free f ON(b.board_no = f.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_market m ON(b.board_no = m.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club c ON(b.board_no = c.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club_notice n ON(b.board_no = n.board_no) WHERE APT_NAME = #{aptName} AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{so.title} || '%' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{so.userId} || '%' ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)
SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND EMAIL = #{email}
